00008 #include <openrave/openrave.h>
00009 #include <openrave/plugin.h>
00010 
00011 using namespace std;
00012 using namespace OpenRAVE;
00013 
00014 class CustomController : public ControllerBase
00015 {
00016 public:
00017     class XMLData : public XMLReadable
00018     {
00019 public:
00020         XMLData() : XMLReadable("piddata") {
00021         }
00022         vector<dReal> pgains,igains;
00023     };
00024 
00025     class PIDXMLReader : public BaseXMLReader
00026     {
00027 public:
00028         PIDXMLReader(boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> piddata, const AttributesList& atts) {
00029             _piddata = piddata;
00030             if( !_piddata )
00031                 _piddata.reset(new XMLData());
00032             RAVELOG_INFO("the attributes piddata is created with are:\n");
00033             for(AttributesList::const_iterator itatt = atts.begin(); itatt != atts.end(); ++itatt)
00034                 RAVELOG_INFO("%s=%s\n",itatt->first.c_str(),itatt->second.c_str());
00035         }
00036 
00037         virtual XMLReadablePtr GetReadable() {
00038             return _piddata;
00039         }
00040 
00041         virtual ProcessElement startElement(const std::string& name, const AttributesList& atts) {
00042             _ss.str("");
00043             return (name == "pgains" || name=="igains") ? PE_Support : PE_Pass;
00044         }
00045 
00046         virtual bool endElement(const std::string& name)
00047         {
00048             if( name == "piddata" )
00049                 return true;
00050             else if( name == "pgains" )
00051                 // read all the float values into a vector
00052                 _piddata->pgains = vector<dReal>((istream_iterator<dReal>(_ss)), istream_iterator<dReal>());
00053             else if( name == "igains" )
00054                 // read all the float values into a vector
00055                 _piddata->igains = vector<dReal>((istream_iterator<dReal>(_ss)), istream_iterator<dReal>());
00056             else
00057                 RAVELOG_ERROR("unknown field %s\n", name.c_str());
00058 
00059             return false;
00060         }
00061 
00062         virtual void characters(const std::string& ch)
00063         {
00064             _ss.clear();
00065             _ss << ch;
00066         }
00067 
00068 protected:
00069         boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> _piddata;
00070         stringstream _ss;
00071     };
00072 
00073     static BaseXMLReaderPtr CreateXMLReader(InterfaceBasePtr ptr, const AttributesList& atts)
00074     {
00075         // ptr is the robot interface that this reader is being created for
00076         return BaseXMLReaderPtr(new PIDXMLReader(boost::shared_ptr<XMLData>(),atts));
00077     }
00078 
00079     CustomController(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : ControllerBase(penv)
00080     {
00081     }
00082     virtual ~CustomController() {
00083     }
00084 
00085     virtual bool Init(RobotBasePtr robot, const std::vector<int>& dofindices, int nControlTransformation)
00086     {
00087         _probot = robot;
00088         _dofindices = dofindices;
00089         _nControlTransformation = nControlTransformation;
00090 
00091         // read the gains from the XML
00092         boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> piddata = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<XMLData>(GetReadableInterface("piddata"));
00093         if( !!piddata ) {
00094             stringstream ss;
00095             ss << "piddata from custom XML reader is" << endl << "pgains: ";
00096             for(vector<dReal>::iterator it = piddata->pgains.begin(); it != piddata->pgains.end(); ++it)
00097                 ss << *it << " ";
00098             ss << endl << "igains: ";
00099             for(vector<dReal>::iterator it = piddata->igains.begin(); it != piddata->igains.end(); ++it)
00100                 ss << *it << " ";
00101             ss << endl;
00102             RAVELOG_INFOA(ss.str());
00103         }
00104         else
00105             RAVELOG_WARN("failed to find piddata\n");
00106         return true;
00107     }
00108 
00109     virtual const std::vector<int>& GetControlDOFIndices() const {
00110         return _dofindices;
00111     }
00112     virtual int IsControlTransformation() const {
00113         return _nControlTransformation;
00114     }
00115 
00116     virtual void Reset(int options) {
00117     }

00119         return false;

00121     virtual bool SetPath(TrajectoryBaseConstPtr ptraj) {
00122         return false;
00123     }
00124     virtual void SimulationStep(dReal fTimeElapsed) {
00125     }
00126     virtual bool IsDone() {
00127         return false;
00128     }
00129     virtual dReal GetTime() const {
00130         return 0;
00131     }
00132     virtual RobotBasePtr GetRobot() const {

00142 static boost::shared_ptr<void> s_RegisteredReader;
00143 
00144 InterfaceBasePtr CreateInterfaceValidated(InterfaceType type, const std::string& interfacename, std::istream& sinput, EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
00145 {
00146     if( !s_RegisteredReader ) {
00148         s_RegisteredReader = RaveRegisterXMLReader(PT_Controller,"piddata",CustomController::CreateXMLReader);
00149     }
00150     switch(type) {
00151     case PT_Controller:
00152         if( interfacename == "customcontroller")
00153             return InterfaceBasePtr(new CustomController(penv));
00154         break;
00155     default:
00156         break;
00157     }
00158     return InterfaceBasePtr();
00159 }
00160 
00161 void GetPluginAttributesValidated(PLUGININFO& info)
00162 {
00163     info.interfacenames[PT_Controller].push_back("CustomController");
00164 }
00165 
00166 OPENRAVE_PLUGIN_API void DestroyPlugin()
00167 {
00168     s_RegisteredReader.reset(); // unregister the reader
00169 }
